article_title: GOP 2016 Budget Proposal Seeks To Overhaul Social Security, Medicare, and Medicaid

article_metadata.description: Change is coming. The U.S. government continues to spend more money than it brings in each year in revenue. Consequently, change is essential, as the current path is not sustainable. Congressional Republicans recently released their 2016 budget, grabbing headlines across the country with their renewed call to repeal the Affordable [...]
